short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension generates a password based on the main password and site. Two password generated from the same data will be the same.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you creating the same password for all sites? Generate your password for each site, and then forget it? Afraid of losing passwords?

Constant PassGen solves these problems. Enter your main password, site name and login (optional). The extension will generate a password based on your data. If you want to recover the password, enter the same data and the extension will generate the same password.
